main.name: Murtaza Kankroliwala
main.description:
Senior Software Developer, LogisticsNow Pvt. Ltd. 
Skilled in Full Stack Development (Python, ReactJs), Azure, Firebase, MongoDB.
main.bio: I am a dedicated professional with over 4.2+ years of expertise in full-stack web and app development, backed by a bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge in Architecture Designs and development across products. A passionate learner, I thrive on tackling challenging technical projects and am eager to acquire new skills on both professional and personal fronts. I am actively seeking opportunities to apply my knowledge, gain hands-on experience, and explore new technology stacks.

resume.skillmessage: Full Stack Web and App Developer

education.school: M.M. Babasaheb Gawde Institute of Technology

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Full Stack Developer skilled in product, architecture, and design, ensuring seamless system integration and performance.Developed live B2B Web and Mobile App bridging Transporters and Manufacturers, enhancing Supply Chain Logistics.Expertise in React, Python, MongoDB, Redis. Leveraging Firebase (Authentication, Realtime Databases, etc.), Google Cloud(Maps API - Distance, Routing, Optimize Routing, Places autocomplete, etc.), Microsoft Azure tools (CosmosDB, Function Apps, SignalR, Storage Accounts, Frontdoor, SaaS-MongoDB, etc.) for robust application development. Additionally, Managing Team of 6-8 People and working closely to ensure proper project timeline closure and feature/module deployment.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: Full Stack Developer skilled in product, architecture, and design, ensuring seamless system integration and performance.Developed live B2B Web and Mobile App bridging Transporters and Manufacturers, enhancing Supply Chain Logistics.Expertise in React, Python, MongoDB, Redis. Leveraging Firebase (Authentication, Realtime Databases, etc.), Google Cloud(Maps API - Distance, Routing, Optimize Routing, Places autocomplete, etc.), Microsoft Azure tools (CosmosDB, Function Apps, SignalR, Storage Accounts, Frontdoor, SaaS-MongoDB, etc.) for robust application development. Craft UI designs, user flows with precision using Balasamiq, Figma, and draw.io.

work.title: Team Leader for Full Stack App and Web Developer Intern
work.description: Development of Doctor's App using Flutter and Dart for a cutting-edge and efficient tech solution.Designed a patient-centric web app for profile creation, appointment booking, and feedback/review system integration.Served as a Tech Leader, guiding a team of 4-5 individuals to successful project outcomes.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Built a ReactJS-powered Map webapp, showcasing proficiency in creating compact and functional location-based solutions.Tested web applications, provided feedback, and contributed to bug resolution, ensuring enhanced performance and user experience.
